definition[0]: use this to say that something is normal and not surprising
example[0]: Naturally, you’ll want to discuss this with your wife.
example[1]: Naturally enough, she wanted her child to grow up fit and strong.
definition[1]: use this to say ‘yes’ when you agree with someone or when you think the person who asked the question should know that your reply will be ‘yes’
definition[2]: in a way that is the result of nature, not of someone’s actions
example[4]: Speaking in public seems to come quite naturally to her.
definition[3]: in a relaxed manner without trying to look or sound different from usual
example[5]: Just speak naturally and pretend the microphone isn’t there.
